text:
Pleased to see President Biden announce plans to:

1. Use the Defense Production Act to ramp up domestic production of infant formula.

2. Ship infant formula in from overseas.

@SenRubioPress and I introduced legislation on Monday to do exactly that.

As co-chairs of @GOPLeader's Healthy Future Task Force, @RepGuthrie and I are pleased to unveil solutions to combat future public health threats. Special thanks to @RepRichHudson, @RepJimBanks & @TomColeOK04 for leading the charge on these critical issues. https://t.co/fv69ni6Nft

Winning the economic war against China is essential for our future. That’s why I’m working to help the U.S. become the innovation and manufacturing capital of the world.

Read my latest op-ed below ⬇️
https://t.co/Dsu8B8fg3s

Great news! My bill to help ensure student veterans are able to take advantage of the G.I. Bill credits they have earned and deserve just passed the House! I’m hopeful the Senate will soon take up this bill, bringing it one step closer to becoming law. https://t.co/fk8cygpFcM

With more than 40% of baby formula out of stock across the country, we need to ramp up domestic production ASAP. That's why I just introduced a bill with @SenRubioPress to address this crisis and help bring peace of mind to families across the country. https://t.co/r1qsKdVKCk

I’m leading 52 of my colleagues in calling for the passage of my bill, the #ThinBlueLine Act, to toughen penalties against cop killers. We need to show law enforcement that we have their backs now more than ever. #PoliceWeek
https://t.co/QWOqivVMf5
My statement praising the wonderful people of Manatee County in response to a @HeraldTribune column today. https://t.co/6FdPSnYBGL
